params.shouldAccrue: Whether or not to call accrue first

params.to: The address to receive the rewards

params.governor_: The governor who will control the contract

params.account: The account to check rewards for

params.multiplier: The multiplier for converting a unit of accrued tracking to a unit of the reward token

params.claimedAmounts: The list of claimed amounts to populate the data with
params.comet: The protocol instance to populate the data for
params.users: The list of users to populate the data for

params.newGovernor: The address of the new governor

params.amount: The number of tokens to withdraw
